creator: mazum@avaya.com
text:
Created attachment 25813
This patch create a new vraibale for NSS related source files and prrovides support for conditional compile using new variable, called XSEC_AM_HAVE_NSS. 

Currently, there is no way to selectively compile only for Mozilla NSS crypto library. 

Existing 'lib/Makefile' only support for OpenSSL in conjunction with "--with-openssl" configuration option. We need to support conditionl compile for Mozilla NSS only or in combination with other Crypto libraries.

May be we need to add XSEC_AM_HAVE_NSS variable similar to XSEC_AM_HAVE_OPENSSL fr conditionally selection of NSS related source files.

creator: cantor.2@osu.edu
text: Fixed in svn as part of overall revisions to makefiles.
